author: Cory Stieg
title: This man ran a marathon on his 23-foot balcony during COVID-19 lockdown—here are the mental tricks he used to finish
description: With running races around the globe canceled and postponed amid the COVID-19 pandemic, Elisha Nochomovitz, a French restaurant manager and marathon enthusiast, had a "crazy idea": run 26.2 miles on a 23-foot balcony. Here's how he pulled off the impressive fe…
content:
Running races from the Boston Marathon to the Tokyo Olympics have been postponed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
So marathon enthusiast Elisha Nochomovitz ran the distance of a marathon on his 23-foot balcony  twice.
Nochomovitz, 32, who lives in Balma, a cit… [+4552 chars]
